headline: Has Ford’s 43.2% Surge in 2025 Run Ahead of Its Fundamentals?
summary: If you are wondering whether Ford Motor is still a classic value play or if the recent run up has left it looking fully priced, you are not alone. This stock has been on a lot of investors' radar lately. Over the last year, Ford shares have climbed 43.2%, with a strong 38.4% gain year to date and almost doubling over 5 years. This move has plenty of people rethinking both its growth potential and risk profile. Much of this momentum has been driven by headlines around Ford's ramp up in...
